Uses of Transaction in presentation
 

Methods in presentation that return Transaction
static Transaction TransactionProperties.initializeTransaction(java.lang.String Transaction)

Methods in presentation with parameters of type Transaction
static void TransactionProperties.graphAnalysis(Transaction tran)
          Performs an analysis on the co-authorship graph of the given transaction using the methods defined in the GraphManager object.
static void TransactionProperties.transactionStatistics(Transaction tran)
          Performs an analysis on the given transaction, extracting some general statistics, using the methods defined in the Transaction object itself.
static void TransactionProperties.volumeTrendAnalysis(Transaction tran)
          Performs a volume trend analysis of the given transaction using the methods defined in the VolumeTrend object.
